types.Name: Acid Attack
types.Text: Deal 1 extra damage each turn (even when you don't otherwise attack).

types.Name: Alien Metabolism
types.Text: Buying cards costs you 1 less [energy].

types.Name: Alpha Monster
types.Text: Gain 1[star] when you attack.

types.Name: Apartment Building
types.Text: + 3[star]

types.Name: Armor Plating
types.Text: Ignore damage of 1.

types.Name: Background Dweller
types.Text: You can always reroll any [3] you have.

types.Name: Burrowing
types.Text: Deal 1 extra damage on Tokyo. Deal 1 damage when yielding Tokyo to the monster taking it.

types.Name: Camouflage
types.Text: If you take damage roll a die for each damage point. On a [heart] you do not take that damage point.

types.Name: Commuter Train
types.Text: + 2[star]

types.Name: Complete Destruction
types.Text: If you roll [1][2][3][heart][attack][energy] gain 9[star] in addition to the regular results.

types.Name: Corner Store
types.Text: + 1[star]

types.Name: Dedicated News Team
types.Text: Gain 1[star] whenever you buy a card.

types.Name: Drop from High Altitude
types.Text: + 2[star] and take control of Tokyo if you don't already control it.

types.Name: Eater of the Dead
types.Text: Gain 3[star] every time a monster's [heart] goes to 0.

types.Name: Energize
types.Text: + 9[energy]

types.Name: energy Hoarder
types.Text: You gain 1[star] for every 6[energy] you have at the end of your turn.

types.Name: Evacuation Orders (x2)
types.Text: All other monsters lose 5[star].

types.Name: Even Bigger
types.Text: Your maximum [heart] is increased by 2. Gain 2[heart] when you get this card.

types.Name: Extra Head (x2)
types.Text: You get 1 extra die.

types.Name: Fire Blast
types.Text: Deal 2 damage to all other monsters.

types.Name: Fire Breathing
types.Text: Your neighbors take 1 extra damage when you deal damage

types.Name: Freeze Time
types.Text: On a turn where you score [1][1][1], you can take another turn with one less die.

types.Name: Frenzy
types.Text: When you purchase this card Take another turn immediately after this one.

types.Name: Friend of Children
types.Text: When you gain any [energy] gain 1 extra [energy].

types.Name: Gas Refinery
types.Text: + 2[star] and deal 3 damage to all other monsters.

types.Name: Giant Brain
types.Text: You have one extra reroll each turn.

types.Name: Gourmet
types.Text: When scoring [1][1][1] gain 2 extra [star].

types.Name: Heal
types.Text: Heal 2 damage.

types.Name: Healing Ray
types.Text: You can heal other monsters with your [heart] results. They must pay you 2[energy] for each damage you heal (or their remaining [energy] if they haven't got enough.

types.Name: Herbivore
types.Text: Gain 1[star] on your turn if you don't damage anyone.

types.Name: Herd Culler
types.Text: You can change one of your dice to a [1] each turn.

types.Name: High Altitude Bombing
types.Text: All monsters (including you) take 3 damage.

types.Name: It Has a Child
types.Text: If you are eliminated discard all your cards and lose all your [star], Heal to 10[heart] and start again.

types.Name: Jet Fighters
types.Text: + 5[star] and take 4 damage

types.Name: Jets
types.Text: You suffer no damage when yielding Tokyo.

types.Name: Made in a Lab
types.Text: When purchasing cards you can peek at and purchase the top card of the deck.

types.Name: Metamorph
types.Text: At the end of your turn you can discard any keep cards you have to receive the [energy] they were purchased for.

types.Name: Mimic
types.Text: Choose a card any monster has in play and put a mimic counter on it. This card counts as a duplicate of that card as if it just had been bought. Spend 1[energy] at the start of your turn to change the power you are mimicking.

types.Name: Monster Batteries
types.Text: When you purchase this put as many [energy] as you want on it from your reserve. Match this from the bank. At the start of each turn take 2[energy] off and add them to your reserve. When there are no [energy] left discard this card.

types.Name: National Guard
types.Text: + 2[star] and take 2 damage.

types.Name: Nova Breath
types.Text: Your attacks damage all other monsters.

types.Name: Nuclear Power Plant
types.Text: + 2[star] and heal 3 damage.

types.Name: Omnivore
types.Text: Once each turn you can score [1][2][3] for 2[star]. You can use these dice in other combinations.

types.Name: Opportunist
types.Text: Whenever a new card is revealed you have the option of purchasing it as soon as it is revealed.

types.Name: Parasitic Tentacles
types.Text: You can purchase cards from other monsters. Pay them the [energy] cost.

types.Name: Plot Twist
types.Text: Change one die to any result. Discard when used.

types.Name: Poison Quills
types.Text: When you score [2][2][2] also deal 2 damage.

types.Name: Poison Spit
types.Text: When you deal damage to monsters give them a poison counter. Monsters take 1 damage for each poison counter they have at the end of their turn. You can get rid of a poison counter with a [heart] (that [heart] doesn't heal a damage also).

types.Name: Psychic Probe
types.Text: You can reroll a die of each other monster once each turn. If the reroll is [heart] discard this card.

types.Name: Rapid Healing
types.Text: Spend 2[energy] at any time to heal 1 damage.

types.Name: Regeneration
types.Text: When you heal, heal 1 extra damage.

types.Name: Rooting for the Underdog
types.Text: At the end of a turn when you have the fewest [star] gain 1 [star].

types.Name: Shrink Ray
types.Text: When you deal damage to monsters give them a shrink counter. A monster rolls one less die for each shrink counter. You can get rid of a shrink counter with a [heart] (that [heart] doesn't heal a damage also).

types.Name: Skyscraper
types.Text: + 4[star]

types.Name: Smoke Cloud
types.Text: This card starts with 3 charges. Spend a charge for an extra reroll. Discard this card when all charges are spent.

types.Name: Solar Powered
types.Text: At the end of your turn gain 1[energy] if you have no [energy].

types.Name: Spiked Tail
types.Text: When you attack deal 1 extra damage.

types.Name: Stretchy
types.Text: You can spend 2[energy] to change one of your dice to any result.

types.Name: Tanks
types.Text: + 4[star] and take 3 damage.

types.Name: Telepath
types.Text: Spend 1[energy] to get 1 extra reroll.

types.Name: Urbavore
types.Text: Gain 1 extra [star] when beginning the turn in Tokyo. Deal 1 extra damage when dealing any damage from Tokyo.

types.Name: Vast Storm
types.Text: + 2[star]. All other monsters lose 1[energy] for every 2[energy] they have.

types.Name: We're Only Making It Stronger
types.Text: When you lose 2[heart] or more gain 1[energy].

types.Name: Wings
types.Text: Spend 2[energy] to negate damage to you for a turn.

types.Name: Amusement Park
types.Text: + 4[star]

types.Name: Army
types.Text: (+ 1[star] and suffer one damage) for each card you have.

types.Name: Cannibalistic
types.Text: When you do damage gain 1[heart].

types.Name: Intimidating Roar
types.Text: The monsters in Tokyo must yield if you damage them.

types.Name: Monster Sidekick
types.Text: If someone kills you, Go back to 10[heart] and lose all your [star]. If either of you or your killer win, or all other players are eliminated then you both win. If your killer is eliminated then you are also. If you are eliminated a second time this card has no effect.

types.Name: Reflective Hide
types.Text: If you suffer damage the monster that inflicted the damage suffers 1 as well.

types.Name: Sleep Walker
types.Text: Spend 3[energy] to gain 1[star].

types.Name: Super Jump
types.Text: Once each turn you may spend 1[energy] to negate 1 damage you are receiving.

types.Name: Throw a Tanker
types.Text: On a turn you deal 3 or more damage gain 2[star].

types.Name: Thunder Stomp
types.Text: If you score 4[star] in a turn, all players roll one less die until your next turn.

types.Name: Unstable DNA
types.Text: If you yield Tokyo you can take any card the recipient has and give him this card.
